title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improved
description: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improved. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. And then the user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled "Error".
OB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed. The error message states that the source page is dirty.
EB: A better and more typical approach would be to inform the user that the XML Report Design has been changed. The dialog should use a better title (without the quotes).
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Edit the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor. 
2. Try to switch back to the Layout view. 
3. Observe the error message indicating that the source page is dirty.
